name: Bullet-Hell RPG Demo
description:
This is a fully playable demo of my now canceled bullet-hell RPG. Accept and complete quests, slaughter enemies, and collect gear!

Controls

  • WASD - move
  • E - interact
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - fire weapon 1
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - fire weapon 2
  • I - inventory
  • C - equipment

Here is the postmortem and my reasoning for canceling the game.
